div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards
div.pre:
1479 Djeble (anc. Gabala) environs, Seleucis, c. 1929 (605) Burial: c. 500-490 B.C. (Schlumberger) Contents: 16 AR Acanthus: 4 tetradr. ANS 1944.100.10205
Athens: 12 tetradr. (as Seltman Grp. L [3]; M [9]) ANS 1944.100.24121 ANS 1944.100.24118 ANS 1944.100.24117 ANS 1944.100.24120 ANS 1944.100.24116 ANS 1944.100.24124 Disposition: New York 6-7 (Athens 6, prob. Acanthus 1) Desneux, RBN 1949, pp. 66-7, nos. 41-41 bis Schwabacher, OpuscArch. 6 (1950), pp. 141 f. Schlumberger, L'argent grec, p. 9, no. 19 Information from H. Seyrig
